name: Pong! (Jakub Mičkech)
description:
A modern take on the classic.

The classic ping-pong game with new, 3D look. Balls speed up over time, and their amount increases. Beat your opponent by estimating the trajectories, and fool them by collisions between individual balls.

Controls:

Player 1:  W/S
Player 2:  Arrow Up/Arrow Down
Pause game: Escape
Score 9 points to win.

Created as a school project for Seaford College, but turned out to be guite fun.
